synonyms: ādi-līlā madhya-līlā antya-līlā āra—therefore there are three periods, namely the ādi-līlā, madhya-līlā and antya-līlā; ebe—now; madhya-līlāra—of the madhya-līlā; kichu—something; kariye—I shall do; vistāra—elaboration.
translation: The pastimes of the Lord are therefore divided into three periods-the ādi-līlā, madhya-līlā and antya-līlā. Now I shall very elaborately describe the madhya-līlā.
